name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this operation definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an authoritative instance of this operation definition is (or will be) published. This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the operation definition is stored on different servers.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this operation definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at whi

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the operation definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the operation definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the operation definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the operation definition author and is not expected to be globally

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the operation definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the operation definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the operation definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the operation definition.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this operation definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this operation definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $kind
desc: Returns: Whether this is an operation or a named query.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether this is an operation or a named query.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A Boolean value to indicate that this operation definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this operation definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the operation definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the operation definition changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the operation definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the operation

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the organization or individual that published the operation definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the operation definition.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the operation definition from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the operation definition from a consumer's perspective.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate operation definition instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate operation definition instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the operation definition is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the operation definition is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the operation definition is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explanation of why this operation definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explanation of why this operation definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $affectsState
desc: Returns: Whether the operation affects state. Side effects such as producing audit trail entries do not count as 'affecting  state'.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the operation affects state. Side effects such as producing audit trail entries do not count as 'affecting  state'.

name: $code
desc: Returns: The name used to invoke the operation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name used to invoke the operation.

name: $comment
desc: Returns: Additional information about how to use this operation or named query.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional information about how to use this operation or named query.

name: $base
desc: Returns: Indicates that this operation definition is a constraining profile on the base.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates that this operation definition is a constraining profile on the base.

name: $resource
desc: Returns: The types on which this operation can be executed.

name: $addresource
desc: The types on which this operation can be executed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The types on which this operation can be executed.

name: $system
desc: Returns: Indicates whether this operation or named query can be invoked at the system level (e.g. without needing to choose a resource type for the context).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether this operation or named query can be invoked at the system level (e.g. without needing to choose a resource type for the context).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Indicates whether this operation or named query can be invoked at the resource type level for any given resource type level (e.g. without needing to choose a specific resource id for the context).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether this operation or named query can be invoked at the resource type level for any given resource type level (e.g. without needing to choose a specific resource id for the context).

name: $instance
desc: Returns: Indicates whether this operation can be invoked on a particular instance of one of the given types.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether this operation can be invoked on a particular instance of one of the given types.

name: $inputProfile
desc: Returns: Additional validation information for the in parameters - a single profile that covers all the parameters. The profile is a constraint on the parameters resource as a whole.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional validation information for the in parameters - a single profile that covers all the parameters. The profile is a constraint on the parameters resource as a whole.

name: $outputProfile
desc: Returns: Additional validation information for the out parameters - a single profile that covers all the parameters. The profile is a constraint on the parameters resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional validation information for the out parameters - a single profile that covers all the parameters. The profile is a constraint on the parameters resource.

name: $parameter
desc: Returns: The parameters for the operation/query.

name: $addparameter
desc: The parameters for the operation/query.

name: $overload
desc: Returns: Defines an appropriate combination of parameters to use when invoking this operation, to help code generators when generating overloaded parameter sets for this operation.

name: $addoverload
desc: Defines an appropriate combination of parameters to use when invoking this operation, to help code generators when generating overloaded parameter sets for this operation.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Defines an appropriate combination of parameters to use when invoking this operation, to help code generators when generating overloaded parameter sets for this operation.
